abstract.t: The document "FIB Suppression with Virtual Aggregation"[I-D.francis-intra-va] describes how FIB size may be reduced. Thelatest revision of that draft refers generically to tunnels, andleaves it to other documents to define the usage and signalingmethods for specific tunnel types. This document provides thosedefinitions for MPLS Label Switched Paths (LSP), without tagstacking.
